title: NASA, FEMA Release Comprehensive Climate Action Guide
summary: NASA and the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) have released a guide which provides resources for adapting to and mitigating impacts of climate change.

title: The large Vulcan rocket is unlikely to make its debut in 2022
summary: ULA has a lot riding on this first Vulcan flight.

title: China aims for space-based solar power test in LEO in 2028, GEO in 2030
summary: China is planning solar power generation and transmission tests at different orbital altitudes over the next decade as part of a phased development of a space-based solar power station.

title: France joins Artemis Accords
summary: France joined the U.S.-led Artemis Accords June 7, a long-anticipated but significant milestone for the effort to establish best practices for sustainable space exploration.

title: SpaceX preparing giant crane to assemble Starship’s first Florida launch tower
summary: SpaceX has begun staging and assembling parts of a giant crane it will soon need to stack Starship’s first East Coast launch...
